location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from John MacLeod, Resident in the Persian Gulf, to Captain Hardy, Senior Officer of Marine in the Gulf of Persia

mods.abstract: MacLeod refers to Hardy's letter of 13 August 1823 and informs him that he has received a despatch from Major Willock which induces him to recommend that any articles that have been left at Maghoo [MagÅ«] should be removed and that the house there should be given up. He also writes about forwarding Major Willock's despatches for India to Muscat so they may be transmitted at the first opportunity to Bombay.
